alert.note: Alert for Davidson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:30PM EDT until June 26 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Davidson County in central North Carolina... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 829 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salisbury, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. 1 inch hail was reported just west of Salisbury at 815 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Linwood, Denton, Newsom, Gordontown, High Rock Boat Dock Marina, Nc Wildlife Access Boat Launch, High Rock Lake Marina & Campground, High Rock Lake and High Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
